DOC.brief_title: Factors Affecting Caloric Regulation Human Feeding
DOC.detailed_description: Energy density refers amount calorie ( energy ) give weight food . For amount energy , large volume ( weight ) food consume food diet low energy density food diet high energy density . The two nutrient large impact energy density fat water . Foods high fat low water content typically high energy density , whereas food low fat high water content , fruit vegetable , low energy density . This study examine whether increase benefit weight loss weight maintenance ad libitum consumption water-rich food add reduced-fat diet , thus make even low energy density . Comparisons : Reduced-energy-dense diet Reduced-fat diet
DOC.criteria: Healthy woman BMI ( body mass index ) 30 40 kg/m2 Normal blood pressure LDL ( low density lipoprotein ) cholesterol < 90th percentile recommendation Triglycerides , fast blood glucose , blood value within normal range Able participate low moderate physical activity . Heart disease Diabetes type I II High blood pressure Renal kidney disease Gastrointestinal disease Blood clot disorder Liver disease cirrhosis Any oral steroid Gout ( require treatment ) Anemia Lung disease Cancer within last 5 year Thyroid disease
